name: Llamagotchi
description:
Are you ready for llama fun?

Your llama needs to get to the top of a mountain! Will you help? Spend days playing games, feeding, and taking care of your llama. Build a barn and gain trust with your llama friend before traveling up the mountain together.

Llamagotchi is a solo developed indie game, every download helps me to continue development to make Llamagotchi even better. Please spread the word to family and friends!

FEATURES
- Explore several beautiful environments as you travel up a mountain with your llama friend
- Build a barn and upgrade it with tons of cool furniture and accessories
- Dress up your llama with cute outfits
- Build a garden and plant beautiful flowers or grow veggies to sell for extra llama coin
- Absolutely 100% ad free with no IAP so you can relax while playing
- Indie game. Help support small developers!

SUPPORT
- Email contact@pandaworksstudio.com with questions, comments, or bugs
